sentences.en: Being an only child , Kampiles grew up in Indiana under the care of his mother.
sentences.cn: 坎派尔斯是个独生子, 在印第安纳州母亲身边长大.

sentences.en: Did you inspect Staff Sergeant Grimm's manifest, sign for the weapons, and contact Indiana?
sentences.cn: 你有签收葛林上士所载运的武器并且随后联络印第安那 吗 ?

sentences.en: Fueling the citification of Indiana has been an expanding, remarkably diversified manufacturing and service company.
sentences.cn: 印地安那州极其多样化的制造业和服务业的不断扩大, 加速了该州城市化的进程.

sentences.en: I hear of lots of Indiana people in my line who are here. "
sentences.cn: 我听说这里有很多和我是同行的印第安纳州人. ”

sentences.en: I hope we will be able to have a good old-fashioned Lincoln-Douglas debate right here in Indiana, so that you can see for yourself to make the decision about who our next President should be.
sentences.cn: 我希望我们可以在这里，印第安纳州，进行像林肯和道格拉斯那样好的传统性辩论，这样你们就可以为自己做出选择，选出谁应该是我们下一任总统。

sentences.en: I own a coffee shop in Southern Indiana. I have a room in the back where I spend most of the week.
sentences.cn: 我在南印第安纳州开了间咖啡屋，咖啡屋后面还有间屋子，我就在那度过一周的大部分时间。

sentences.en: Indiana does not require a permit to keep kangaroos.
sentences.cn: 在印第安那州饲养袋鼠并不需要许可.

sentences.en: Indiana had a history of bigotry unequaled north of the Mason - Dixon line.
sentences.cn: 印地安纳州的种族偏见的历史在 梅森——迪克森 线以北是无出其右的.

sentences.en: Indiana had a history of racial bigotry unequaled north of the Mason - Dixon line.
sentences.cn: 印地安纳州的种族偏见的历史在梅森 ― ―迪克森线以北是无出其右的.

sentences.en: Indiana State laws deliberately subverted the intent of the constitutions 14 th Amendment.
sentences.cn: 印第安纳州的法律有意歪曲联邦宪法第十四条修正案的愿意.

sentences.en: Indiana's legislators cast a suspicious eye toward Washington, passing a vehement resolution.
sentences.cn: 印第安那州议员以怀疑的眼光来看华盛顿, 通过了一项措辞激烈的诀议案.

sentences.en: Rival Hillary Clinton claimed victory in a close race in Indiana.
sentences.cn: 他的对手克林顿参议员则在印第安纳州小胜.

sentences.en: She wanted to donate to the Indiana Mothers Milk Bank in Indianapolis.
sentences.cn: 她想把母乳捐献到印第安纳波利斯市的印第安纳州母乳银行.

sentences.en: So will the area from Milwaukee to Gary, Indiana.
sentences.cn: 从米尔沃基到印地安那州的加里也将如此.

sentences.en: The five states were Texas, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Michigan and Indiana.
sentences.cn: 这5个州分别是得克萨斯州 、 俄亥俄州 、 宾夕法尼亚州 、 密歇根州和印第安那州.

sentences.en: There was a neat safe burglary in Indiana.
sentences.cn: 在印第安纳发生了一起不落痕迹的保险箱盗窃案.

sentences.en: They blew out the Indiana Pacers 118 - 105 , ending a six - game losing streak.
sentences.cn: 他们以 118-105 大胜印第安纳步行者, 终止了六连败.
